clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation and Reconditioning of Marginal Lung Donors to Transplantation by ex Vivo Lung Perfusion
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation and Reconditioning of Marginal Lung Donors to Transplantation by ex Vivo Lung Perfusion

collaborator.agency: Fundação de Amparo à Pesquisa do Estado de São Paulo

brief_summary.textblock: Only about 15% of the potential candidates for lung donation are considered suitable for transplantation. A new method for ex vivo lung perfusion (EVLP) has been developed and can be used for evaluation and reconditioning of "marginal" and unacceptable lungs. The ´purpose of this study is to analyse the executability and safety of ex vivo lung perfusion pulmonary ex vivo in marginal donors.
